Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: I would like to know how the user will use this to understand the API's the SDK's will have to implement or impact to current API's.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~ales With latest design I don't think there is any SDK impact for the normal (public) ownable state, right? I believe all the ownable state logic would all be embedded in chaincode. ~harrisob@us.ibm.com was asking...

Action.author: mne
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com the current, public ownable state targeted for V1.2 there is no SDK impact. SDK support would just be needed for the future, privacy-preserving versions.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Added v1.3 to the short name to eliminate confusion when looking at v1.2 dashboards.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: No SDK impact for the core state-based endorsement feature, however there will likely be an impact to Service Discovery that will therefore impact SDK (this part is deferred for v1.3, and will be tracked separately).
